Name: Avengers: Age of Ultron
Quote1: But I always say,'Keep your friends rich and your enemies rich, and wait to find out which is which.
Quote3: Hey big guy, the sun's getting real low.

Name: Blade
Quote1: How do you think that we fund this organization, huh? We're not exactly the March of Dimes.
Quote2: You can slice him, you can dice him, but the Quinn man just keeps on comin'!

Name: The Shawshank Redemption
Quote1: I think a man working outdoors feels more like a man if he can have a bottle of suds. That's only my opinion.
Quote2: I Understand you're a man who knows how to get things.
Quote3: Get busy living or get busy dying.

Name: The Godfather
Quote1: Hey, whaddya gonna do, nice college boy, eh?
Quote2: You can act like a man!
Quote3: I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse.

Name: The Dark Knight
Quote1: Do you have any idea who you're stealing from? You and your friends are dead!
Quote2: You either die a hero or you live long enough to see yourself become the villain.
Quote3: Oh, you look nervous. Is it the scars? You want to know how I got 'em?
